questions.question: Which UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for hosting one of the largest collections of prehistoric petroglyphs, and is located in one of the most arid regions in the world?

answer.label: Rupestrian Rock Art of the Altamira Cave, Spain

questions.context: This cave, discovered in 1868, shows vivid depictions of large mammals and human hands, dating back to the Upper Paleolithic.
